main.name: Zachary Vallarino
main.bio: Hey! I am Zach! Motivated Full Stack developer with experience in Healthcare and Project Management. Passionate about building clean products. I love to learn and stay to stay up to date on the latest trends. Lets build something cool together!
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to be a part of the PAPA fam!

work.description: Spearheaded projects that produced $17M in savings in 2017, $210M in cost avoidance, and $19M in savings in 2016.Developed Bloomberg-connected spreadsheets summarizing product pricing and their raw materials

testimonials.text: Sonny is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
Learning with Sonny has been AWESOME, he makes learning React so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
